dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: projectContributor
dataModel.author: John Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about a party contributing to a project.
entity.entityDescription: This table serves as an intersection entity used to 'link' a party with a specific project wherin vegetation plots are described.

attribute.attNotes: Primary key for the projectContributor table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique contribution to a project.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the project table
attribute.attDefinition: Foreign key linking the contribution to a specific project.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the party table
attribute.attDefinition: Foreign key linking the contribution to a specific party.
The role that a specific party had in the project (e.g., PI, coPI, contact, author, research advisor, etc.).
